directions: Mix cream cheese, chili powder, paprika and Cheddar cheese in a bowl. Transfer mixture to a zip-top bag and snip a small piece off of one corner of the bag.  Split smoked sausages down the middle without cutting them in half.
Squeeze a little cheese mixture into each smoked sausage. Place on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes until heated.
Serve hot, sprinkled with lime zest and cilantro.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage
title: Chili-Cheese Stuffed Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage
